text: Ezra e duu i hongo di hada dela ne hau gi di laangi hagalabagau deenei. Gei ogo digau aanei e tuu i di baahi gau donu o Ezra: go Mattithiah, Shema, Anaiah, Uriah, Hilkiah, mo Maaseiah, gei ogo digau aanei e tuu i baahi gau ihala o maa: Pedaiah, Mishael, Malchijah, Hashum, Hashbaddanah, Zechariah, mo Meshullam.
